name: Sync invoices from Moco to Bexio

nodes.name: Stop on wrong status
nodes.notes: will only sync invoice to Bexio, when status is sent

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "document_nr": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.identifier }}", 
  "title": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.title }}",
  "contact_id": {{ $('Search Contact in Bexio').item.json.id }}, 
  "contact_sub_id": null,
  "user_id": 2,
  "pr_project_id": null,
  "language_id": 1,
  "bank_account_id": 2,
  "currency_id": 1,
  "payment_type_id": 1,
  "header": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.salutation.replaceAll("\n", "  ") }}",
  "footer": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.footer.replaceAll("\n", "  ") }}",
  "mwst_type": 0,
  "mwst_is_net": true,
  "show_position_taxes": false,
  "is_valid_from": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.date }}",
  "is_valid_to": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.due_date }}",
  "contact_address_manual": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.recipient_address.replaceAll("\n", "  ") }}",
  "reference": null,
  "api_reference": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.identifier }}",
  "template_slug": "{{ $('Get document templates from Bexio').item.json.template_slug }}",
  "positions": [
    {
      "amount": "1",
      "unit_id": 1,
      "account_id": {{ $('Lookup Account in Bexio').item.json.id }},
      "tax_id": {{ $('Lookup Account in Bexio').item.json.tax_id }},
      "text": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.identifier +": "+ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.title }}",
      "unit_price": "{{ $('Update Invoice in Moco').item.json.body.net_total }}",
      "discount_in_percent": "0.000000",
      "type": "KbPositionCustom"
    }
  ]
}

={
"nr": null,
"contact_type_id": 1,
"name_1": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.customer.name }}",
"name_2": null,
"titel_id": null,
"birthday": null,
"address": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.billing_address.split("\n")[1] }}",
"postcode": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.billing_address.split("\n")[2].split(" ")[0] }}",
"city": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.billing_address.split("\n")[2].split(" ")[1] }}",
"country_id": 1,
"mail": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.billing_email_to || $('Get company from Moco').item.json.email }}",
"phone_fixed": "{{ $('Get company from Moco').item.json.phone }}",
"phone_mobile": "",
"url": "{{ $('Get company from Moco').item.json.website }}",
"skype_name": "",
"remarks": "{{ $('Get Project from Moco').item.json.billing_address.replaceAll("\n","\\n") + "\\n\\n" + new Date().toLocaleDateString() + ", Added from Moco via n8n" }}",
"user_id": 2,
"owner_id": 2
}

nodes.name: Mark invoice as SENT in Bexio

body.title: Akonto – Muster-PVA 20kWp
body.salutation:
Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren

Wir erlauben uns, folgende Positionen in Rechnung zu stellen:
body.footer:
Bitte den Betrag von 5'405.00 CHF unter Angabe der Rechnungsnummer R240003 bis zum 03.01.2025 mit beiliegendem Einzahlungsschein  überweisen.

Vielen Dank für den Auftrag und das damit verbundene Vertrauen.
Bei Fragen stehen wir sehr gerne zur Verfügung.

Sonnige Grüsse
Tom Plüss

PVcontracting AG - CHE-148.458.912 MWST

Schweiz

json.text: Rechnung kann nicht nach Bexio gesandt werden. Fehler: 422 - "{"error_code":422,"message":"The form could not be saved due to the following errors:","errors":["global: Diese Dokumentennummer wird bereits verwendet."]}"

Rechnung kann nicht nach Bexio gesandt werden. Fehler: 422 - "{"error_code":422,"message":"The form could not be saved due to the following errors:","errors":["global: Diese Dokumentennummer wird bereits verwendet."]}"
